attributes.action: prosecute drivers who block their windscreens with sat nav systems
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government needs to take steps to ensure that sat nav systems are used safely and to prosecute drivers who obscure their vision with sat nav screens, thus endangering themselves and other road users.  The current trend to fix large sat nav screens on car windscreens is potentially more dangerous that the use of mobile phones whilst driving, but no action seems to be being taken to stop this dangerous practice

rejection.details: Government does not prosecute people. I would suggest re-wording your petition to ask for a change in the law regarding the way sat navs are used.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
